metadata.title: 365 Sleepers 316L Surgical Steel 20G 18G 16G 14G 12G 10G 8G 6G Septum Hinged Segment Nose Lip Helix Rook Cartilage Ring Hoop Earrings Body Jewelry
features: Solid 316L Surgical Stainless Steel - Hypoallergenic - Sold Individually - 1 Piece

365 SLEEPERS rings are the most popular type of nose hoop/earring with a smooth finish, no sharp edge and spin completely through the piercing making them extremely comfortable to wear. They are easy to open and close and do not require any tools. You can sleep, swim, work, or exercise with these in as they click shut and will not fall out. Safe metal suitable for healing a fresh piercing. Sleeper Earrings need to be disinfected before using.

365 SLEEPERS is a well-known and Trusted Brand. We are a family business based in Sydney, Australia and have over 40 years of experience in the jewellery industry and only sell the highest quality jewellery. If you have any questions, we will respond to your email within 24 hours. We offer free return or exchange. You're going to LOVE our Sleepers, We Guarantee It!
description: 365 Sleepers are made of the highest quality non-irritant hypoallergenic 316L Surgical Stainless Steel. They are lead free and nickel free. The smooth continuous design of 365 Sleepers means they are very easy to open and click closed by hand. They do not require a tool. Smooth surface, comfortable to wear without sharp edge. Match with suitable apparel for different occasion. The perfect gift for you or your loved ones. Great gift for Valentine's Day, Birthday, Mother's Day, Christmas, or any occasion!
